itemDescription: British miniature painter and art dealer in Rome (1751-1841)

wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Day (ca. 1751 – 12 January 1841) was a miniature painter and art dealer. Born in Britain, he worked chiefly in Rome.

response: **Alexander Day, English miniature painter and art dealer (died 1841)
* January 12 – Alexander Day, English miniature painter and art dealer (born 1772)

Per the National Gallery, and in contradiction to the Agincourt publication, the painting was acquired by George Canning, 1st Lord Garvagh in 1818 from Alexander Day's collection before it was sold in 1865 to the National Gallery by his widow and heirs for £9,000.
* Alexander Day (artist), British miniaturist and art dealer
Alexander Day or Alex Day may be:
*Alexander Day (artist), 1751–1841, British artist and art collector
